title: [Dynamic Regions]After using MultiRocks DB, the store size of TiKV surged unexpectedly, which is not in line with expectations
body:
version 6.6.0 
workload : tpcc 200 threads  6h
we found that the tikv store size surged unexpectedly with the  MultiRocks DB,is not in line with expectations 
clinic :https://clinic.pingcap.com.cn/portal/#/orgs/33/clusters/7204975639031210766
